    • Field Detail

      • ACTION_NEW_CHAT

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_NEW_CHAT
        Broadcast action: a new chat message has been received.

        Intent includes the following extras:

        • EXTRA_CONTACT containing the MSISDN of the remote contact
        • EXTRA_DISPLAY_NAME containing the display name of the contact sending the invitation (extracted from the SIP address).
        • EXTRA_MESSAGE containing the chat message (parcelable object).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_CONTACT

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_CONTACT
        MSISDN of the contact sending the invitation
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_DISPLAY_NAME

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_DISPLAY_NAME
        Display name of the contact sending the invitation (extracted from the SIP address)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_MESSAGE

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_MESSAGE
        Received message
        See Also:
        ChatMessage, GeolocMessage, Constant Field Values
